founders.founderBio: Founder @livday • Building a company that makes it 100x easier to do new things in your free time • My thoughts at: www.medium.com/@gold_medallion

name: Livday
product_desc:
Free time is not only our most precious resource but is also insanely important for our happiness. Yet finding things to do & creating a plan is shockingly difficult. You could spend hours doing Google & Yelp cross-references before coming up with a plan for great date, hiking adventure or way to spend time with your family outside the house.

We make this process 100x easier by giving people the tools to publish their favorite things to do so that others can enjoy them without having to research & plan. The best analogy is that Livday is like a "cookbook" for your free time, but rather than food recipes people share "things to do" recipes. We're conducting an SF public test.

Our motto is "Life is a work of art. Create your masterpiece." We want to remind people that our screens can never fulfill us like having new experiences with loved ones can. Our mission is to revolutionize how people spend & think about their free time. If you believe in that mission we'd love to hear from you.

They can advertise on free and paid job portals from a single account. Urbanhire is also a collaborative platform that empowers applicant-tracking by multiple users.

Urbanhire is the efficient way to find the talents you’ll love.

Women face challenges at every stage of career advancement -- whether it’s how to negotiate salary or ask for a raise, how to file for important maternity and health-related leaves, and even when its time to call it quits -- and during these, some of the most challenging and fulfilling moments in our lives, we have to navigate how decisions like having a family could affect our chances for career advancement.

name: NEOVEL Technologies
product_desc:
NEOVEL Technologies develops stretchable video displays. We advance current organic light emitting diode (OLED) technology by replacing all rigid and opaque components with innovative elastic and transparent nanomaterial counterparts. The result is a transparent and elastic OLED (TE-OLED) video display with the functionality of a TV, yet a stretchable form factor. TE-OLEDs achieve a 10x improvement in mechanical elasticity when compared to state-of-the-art curved displays.

TE-OLEDs penetrate a current technological gap in the semi-flexible display market, providing enhanced flexibility with the addition of elasticity. The increased elasticity provides significant added value to wearable electronics, including improved form factor, enhanced versatility of the user interface, and product differentiation.

NEOVEL Technologies develops a disruptive technology pertinent to a growth market.

high_concept: Personalized memory care platform for people with neurological disorders
name: MemoryCo
product_desc:
We solve memory problems in patients with neurological disorders to help them thrive in real-world situations.  We do this by developing memory care solutions using personalized content and precise strategies. 

We include non-generic personally-relevant content in our memory training tasks. Patients work on improving their real-world memory function using information relevant to their daily lives.  For example, instead of playing a generic memory game, your parent can use her own pictures of family and neighborhood maps as part of her personalized training program.  Training with relevant content that the patient is connected with is much more effective than one-size-fits-all approaches. 

Using the information gathered from each patient's performance and clinical data, we train our proprietary machine learning algorithm to identify optimal learning strategies. This enables us to leverage functional brain networks of each patient to overcome shortcomings due to neurological disease.

Unlike IBM DemandTEC or other enterprise solutions, Perfect Price takes less than 15 minutes for one engineer to set up, and we manage everything on our SaaS platform–from data collection to testing new prices. 

To do this we use new models never before seen in this space, based on work done at Microsoft, Twitter, Drawbrid.ge, and drawing on and advancing open source technologies like Apache Hadoop. Our patent-pending matching algorithms connect billions of products around the web across retailers, even when UPC, title and other metadata make it hard for humans to accurately compare them, with 98% precision.

high_concept: Smart jacket with variable thermal protection
name: Omius
product_desc:
An Omius jacket will monitor your activity level, temperature and humidity; in order to adapt its structure and give you exactly the thermal protection you need to be always comfortable. It’s like having the power of instantly making any type of jacket appear or disappear, always at the right moment.

With a mixture of state of the art robotics and textiles, we were able to replicate nature's ability to regulate temperature, specifically of that of plants. Instead of trying to make the hot and humid air leave the body through the tight windproof membrane, as companies like The North Face try to do, we will open this barrier creating a much freer path for air to flow. 

The result: our jacket is able to release two times more excess heat than the most breathable jacket in the market. This technology will bring great benefits to the winter sport users, usually affected by large variations in activity levels and extreme ambient conditions.

Just choose your contact, speak and we deliver the Tin instantly. The recipient gets the Tin in-app. If they don't have the app, they get the Tin via a phone call. The fact that your Tin instantly reaches your friend, colleague or loved one irrespective of their connectivity status makes this hyper reliable and a sound user experience – TinCan is essentially voice messaging that works.
 
TinCan looks like your phone app and gives you notifications like your messenger app, bringing the best of both the voice and texting worlds. As this community expands and IoT proliferates, we will build the platform for Voice based Commerce, Community and Search. We believe Voice is yet to have its finest hour.

Pluto is the actionable personal finance app designed to help millennials afford the things they really need and want, by directly tying their spending behavior to their saving goals in a fun and seamless way. We help them build better money habits and reach their saving goals through bite-sized challenges (personalized and customizable) and actionable goal-based savings (manual or automated). Our vision is to create the next-generation banking experience that leverages behavioral science, contextual data and actionable financial tech to provide smart, effective guidance towards financial fitness. name: Greenuke Technology
product_desc:
We are a green engineering company focused on developing green technologies.What Henry Bessemer did in the steel industry – with the introduction of the Bessemer process – is what my partner and I have done and are ready to introduce in the energy sector.

We have developed a new technology that allows for the reduction and elimination of all types of radioactive waste – including high-level waste – by a concentration factor of at least 2,000 to 1; something that has never been done before. The technology is so compact that it mounts directly to the storage tank, there is no need to construct any additional facilities, and we can provide any desired output rate.

Prior to our technology the only way to decrease radioactive waste was through time, through a process called radioactive decay. For instance,  plutonium-239 has a half-life of 24,000 years. 

We have built four successful pilot project and are now looking to go into full commercialization with the right financial partner.

name: AgriData
product_desc:
AgriData digitalizes agriculture by providing an asset tracking system for permanent crops (trees and vines, aka high-value crops). Farmers using the product are able to:
- predict their yield
- time their harvest
- detect pests

Digitalizing permanent crops has never been done for 2 reasons: (1) autonomous vehicles were needed to avoid prohibitive costs of installing cameras everywhere in the field, (2) the complexity of developing computer vision software capable of turning trees and fruits into 1's and 0's. AgriData is leveraging the advancements made in autonomy, both ground-based and aerial and has developed proprietary computer vision technology that allows us to accurately identify and count permanent crop assets.

By 2050, agriculture will need to produce 70% more than it is today with the same amount of arable land, this WILL NOT HAPPEN without us getting a DIGITAL handle on our crops. Help us make sure we can feed our children.

high_concept: Connecting Buyers and Sellers in Demand-Based Marketplace
name: Wantboards
product_desc:
Wantboards connects consumers (buyers) to businesses/retailers (sellers) in a demand-based marketplace. Buyers post a Wantboard of exactly what they want, and the Wantboards team finds them sellers that have what they’re looking for. The end goal is that the two parties reach an agreement and complete a transaction. 

Our platform is aimed at buyers that like to hunt for better deals and the local sellers that can make better deals. In that regard, that can be anybody on the buyer side. On the seller side, we want to work with the small, local businesses that are willing to work with buyers on better pricing. In addition to helping our buyers get a better deals, we want to provide sellers with an ongoing outlet for finding new customers by alerting them when a posted Wantboard matches their inventory.

- Summary Dashboard to provide a complete summary of all connected drives
- Highly interactive File Manager
- Collaborative Editor for online collaboration just like Google Docs
- Tags to Organize Files
- Directory Based sharing, shared files are automatically synced across with users who it is shared with
- Unlimited Cloud Storage Space
- Common File operations e.g. rename, move, copy, delete etc.

Features like Tags to Organize Files, Director based Sharing along with Link Based Sharing are not found in any of our competitors. Later we intend to introduce the first ever Universal Collaborator allowing you to collaborate on files where providers may or may not provide collaboration yet.

high_concept: The platform for sharing and promoting any calendar, finally.
name: KALi
product_desc:
Innovation in digital calendars has not kept pace with the rest of the Internet over the past 20 years. Major platforms (i.e. Google, Microsoft, and Apple) have worsened the problem through their intentional lack of interoperability. The result is a massively disorganized array of calendars on countless disconnected and unstructured websites. 

KALi is a platform through which users can discover, subscribe, engage and share calendars and events far easier than ever before. Calendar publishers, such as businesses and brands, promote and share content on their own KALi “Calendar Channel” to engage and transact with users. KALi offers transactions processing, social engagement and smart event recommendations. The user experience will be free, while business partners will pay for promotion, placement, transactions and analytical tools.

Nest.AI makes business travel automatic with an intelligent agent enabled platform that proactively anticipates business travel needs and services. Nest.ai saves time, money, and offers a more efficient experience for frequent business travelers. 

Frequent business travelers find it extremely frustrating to be living in a world of airlines, restaurants, & atrium hotels full of painful delays, unhealthy environments, crappy web interfaces, and annoying manual processes.  By using machine learning Nest.AI can manage your team's bookings and seamlessly navigate personal preferences, company policy, and accommodation providers to make the next business trip easier and less expensive.

founders.founderBio: Studied @stanford-university, @dartmouth-college.  Thrives in creative development, strategy, video, design, content strategy, branding and building companies.

name: Outflank
product_desc:
What's the best way to make an effective video? Ask 1000 people, you'll get 1000 different answers. 

The process of making videos hasn't changed--ever. Each creative contributor-editors, sound guys, producers, creative directors, marketers, project sponsors-you name it, has their own personal bias. This means marketers end up with gut-based creative. Big, fat, expensive risk.

Marketers want to create effective video to drive revenues, but have little knowledge of what will be effective.  

Outflank believes there is an optimal, data-driven decision for every creative variable. We remove the guesswork and expense from video production by applying data & analytics to a world-class content library then using our automated video generation engine to create beautiful videos that are empirically effective.  Lower cost videos that perform better. 

Boom.  The face of video has changed.

high_concept: A smart photo organizer app with voice recognition.
name: vPhoto
product_desc:
vPhoto accepts text or voice commands and is able to find all media, even those created before installing the app (for date/time searches). Photos and videos taken with the app’s camera may be retrieved later by where the photo or video was taken (ex., “Hawaii”).

This app has a unique ability to recognize natural voice commands such as “Get my photos from last summer” and return the desired photos. Here are some of its other features:

Tags. You can add searchable tags to groups of photos and videos in batch using text or voice commands.

Share. Tag your friends in your photo gallery and you’ll be able to share those with friends. If your friends have the app too, they will get your shared photos along with the searchable tags that you added.

Cloud. Your photo gallery will be backed up in the cloud and synced from there to all your devices.

Voice recognition. The app will recognize your voice and translate those commands into queries.

founders.founderBio: SL Robert Liu  CEO & CTO of Yintran.  Engineering and banking for 25 years in Hong Kong, LA, NYC, and Silicon Valley. W&M BS, Stanford MS Engineering, UCLA MBA.
Creator of Censi. UCLA Business Economics, w/ Specialization in Computing grad. Worked at Hitachi Consulting, & Oakwood Worldwide

name: Censi
product_desc:
Censi is an internet polling and data aggregation site, where users' answers are structured, stored, and combined to create an ever-expanding set of anonymous social statistics and opinions. With this, combined with interactive graphs and traditional data analytic tools, we aim to create a global resource for both the average person, and data-focused organizations.

Think of it like quantified version of Askreddit and Quora, or a statistical Wikipedia.

Using Censi, consumers can ask and discover any kind of structured information, from the world's average height, Obama's approval rating, to people's favorite breakfast cereal, while also allowing them to control for ANY variable. Think of it almost like a statistical version of Wikipedia or AskReddit.

Though the eventual target market is the dreaded "everyone on the Internet", we intend to initially focus on attracting academic social scientists and students as early adopters, allowing them to use Censi to augment their own research.

name: EARN
product_desc: Low-income workers need a savings product that meets their needs and jump starts savings behavior. There are no goal-based savings products on the market that build short-term savings behavior. EARN’s Starter Account fills the gap. Our online product incentivizes saving by rewarding Savers for making a $20 minimum and consecutive monthly deposits. By focusing on small and quick wins, we build a savings habit. The account is simple. Clients open an EARN Starter Account online. They link their own savings account at one of 19,000 banks. They make deposits and earn rewards. They reach their goal and collect the rewards. After completing our program, Savers can weather financial storms, plan for the future, budget finances and build confidence. Our platform is also capable of hosting new products in the future– savings accounts for education and retirement, for example.

Customers with smartphones and social media (SM) channel are the local merchant's best customers, since they can and do create content (not limited to, but think food pics) and post it on their SM.  

Most local merchants do not have the time nor the money to produce 24/7 SM posts.   Customer-Sourced ads address both of those issues, since the content and distribution is done via the customer's SM channel. 

From the user's perspective, Moopon is a mobile app that allows them to post on SM in order to get a discount at the merchant location.  From the merchant's perspective, Moopon is a SM ad platform to manage Customer-Sourced SM ads.  

To incentivize the customers, the local merchants give a nominal reward/discount to customers for using Moopon.  Moopon collects a monthly fee from merchants who use the platform.

Evergive's local affinity network connects you with your trusted community.

Distribution and awareness are the biggest problems faced when introducing new technology to this market. We solve this with a proprietary ranking algorithm that mines people data from multiple sources to fuel organic growth and make high-confidence determinations of community membership.

name: MYi
product_desc: MYi wants to revolutionize preventative and personalized medicine. Using a modular platform, MYi has the technology to analyze hundreds of molecules in a drop of blood, where those molecules are both identified and quantified using a consumer next-generation sequencing device.  The obtained molecular information can be ported to a medical professional and then rerouted to the consumer as a medically curated report.  As we leverage the multiplex and high-throughput nature of next-generation sequencing, we can analyze hundreds of different samples in parallel, drastically minimizing costs.  With far reaching applications in cancer diagnostics, blood analyses, early disease detection, and precision medicine the potential for MYi to revolutionize medicine is high.  Our vision at MYi aims to transform academic research, dramatically lower costs of routine blood tests in the clinic, and ultimately be the product consumers use for "at-home" preventative health.

Clock Speed is a Review Anything App.  Review anything, anywhere, from restaurants, to the food on your airplane flight, your airplane seat, to that new mouse you got that stopped working after a week, to the dog food you purchased that your dog wont eat, to your annoying 12th grade math teacher.  Y stop inside the Box? Text based reviews are great, video reviews are even better.  With this App you have the option to do both. If you have coordinates for it in time X Space it can be reviewed.   Anything can be reviewed and updated.  Even the rusting doorstop in your beach house that you'd like to know the manufacturer + who installed, at what time and was it after his lunch break.   Its a new way of reviewing things in time and space.  The intent is to eventually use it for iOT, Robotics, Tracking, but also serves the wider purpose of Review Anything at anytime, for humans.  If it Exists, it can be reviewed.  Even the gun under your shoe.  It Can be reviewed.

founders.founderBio: Founder of BEFORE ELIXIR, a natural tonic that reduces redness caused by drinking and alleviates hangovers so you can "Be Ready, Not Red!"

name: Before Elixir
product_desc:
Before Elixir is a drink that prevents people from turning red when they drink alcohol. It also alleviates the effects of hangovers. You drink it 30 minutes prior to consuming alcohol and with every 3rd drink. It tastes great and makes an excellent mixer.

People who turn red when they drink alcohol have a problem known as "Asian glow." It affects 15% of all drinkers and 70% of Asians around the world. That's well over 1 billion people! 

These people turn red because they metabolize alcohol too quickly, up to 40x faster than normal. This creates a buildup of a toxin in the liver that causes flushing of the face and body, nausea, headaches, pounding heartbeats, and many other unpleasant feelings. 

Before Elixir works by slowing down the metabolism of alcohol and reducing the amount of the toxin in the liver that causes redness.

We tested dozens of people at various tasting parties. According to their reports, Before Elixir works on 90% of people and reduces flushing by over 60%.

product_desc:
Solbit is a family education robot based on STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Math) framework, with integrated camera and voice recognition with a cloud-based language library, whose primary mission to be the child’s personal learning companion. In the morning, the child is warmly welcomed by Solbit, in the afternoon, Solbit reviews Math with the child and in the evening, Solbit reads a story with the child and then plays soothing music to put the child to bed. The initial target user are children ages 4 – 7 years old and the target buyer are their parents, generally in the age range of 25 – 40 years old.

Solbit is part of a game changing solution that enables children to have emotionally engaging life and skills-building learning experiences via learning games that integrate with our Robot, daily reminders that guide parents and integrated with Internet of Things (IoT) devices (e.g., sensors throughout the home) to complete the family experience.

The world's first viral content marketplace, Riddle makes it easy for busy publishers and brands to source or create the best viral interactive content to engage and grow their audiences.

Riddle's rich pool of trending viral content is written by hand-curated experts, so publishers can easily find content across dozens of topics.

Once they find the perfect piece, publishers can:
* 'CLONE IT' (free) - but with no editing privilege and giving the author attribution
* 'OWN IT' - buy a license from the creator for full edit privileges and no attribution

Solving both the supply and demand issues at once, creators get the recognition and rewards they've been lacking at other *Buzz sites, while publishers gain access to a steady stream of high quality interactive content for their content-hungry audiences.

Riddle’s team has a rich heritage in user-generated content and interactive entertainment – from video game companies like Kabam to the original viral publisher Tickle.com.

name: Swipe Out Hunger
product_desc:
University students who live on campus purchase meal plans that earn them 10-20 meals each week. If a student doesn't use all of their meals by the week's end, they roll over and accrue. By the end of the year, students are often left with hundreds of dollars on their meal plans. What happens to those dollars? Nothing, they are nonredeemable–you cannot get them back. 

This is where Swipe Out Hunger comes in. We give university students the opportunity to donate their unused meals to individuals just down the street (or on their own campus) who are facing hunger. 

It takes a student just seconds to donate and through a partnership with the university, the funds are donated directly to a hunger relief organization.

name: EZC Pak
product_desc:
The EZC Pak is a 5-day immune support pack positioned and marketed as a physician-directed replacement for inappropriate antibiotic prescription drugs for common colds and the flu, broadly termed viral upper respiratory infections (URIs).  Without behavioral changes to antibiotic usage, it is estimated that global death from drug resistant infections will surpass cancer by 2050.

Composed of certified organic Echinacea, zinc, and vitamin C, the EZC Pak is formulated based upon the best available scientific evidence in the management of viral URIs married to innovative packaging design that addresses the cultural, socioeconomic, and psychological factors that result in inappropriate antibiotic prescribing and use.  

The mission of the EZC Pak is to change the fundamental management of URIs, the most common infection in humans, which is currently contributing to rising global drug resistance and death.

product_desc:
SURKUS was founded with a mission to revolutionize the way people experience their cities, and the way business owners and marketers directly engage with their target audience. Using the power of CrowdCasting, SURKUS elevates venues, campaigns, and events by ensuring the ideal crowd is in place.

SURKUS works similar to a movie casting: through an easy-to-use app, the platform matches people, or SURKUSgoers, with events based on their profile and preferences.

Using a unique proprietary algorithm which collects relevant data from each SURKUSgoer, the system aggregates content from all social media feeds. Influencers are identified, qualified, and recruited (cast). 

Businesses can use SURKUS to incentivize the perfect crowd to attend by minimizing traditional advertising and promotional costs. Through SURKUS, businesses are connected with their ideal crowds, and users get to attend events at must-see venues.

name: Report It, Girl
product_desc:
Report It, Girl leverages technology to promote healing for survivors of sexual violence. One in three women will endure sexual victimization in her lifetime. In the aftermath, many survivors experience debilitating physical and psychological effects (PTSD, depression, eating disorders, etc.) that often go untreated.

Research by James Pennebaker indicates that expressive writing can foster healing. Our first product (reportitgirl.com) is a safe, moderated platform that enables survivors to read, write and share their stories.

Our newest product is My Day, an app that will let you create and track your healing journey. Users will be able to confidentially record harmful incident(s), select healing milestones (e.g., disclosure, attending therapy, writing), log mood status (e.g., calm, stressed, depressed), track triggering events, and view overall progress towards recovery on personalized dashboard. Users will be able to connect with others based on shared milestones or mood status.

product_desc: twazer is an innovative P2P mobile commerce application. It provides its users with a safe and efficient way to buy/sell items in their community. That’s why we created twazer. twazer is safe: Every twazer user is authenticated and kept accountable through a rating system. Also, all communications between users are done via an in-app messaging system in order to protect personal contact information. Finally, twazer promotes cashless transactions through a third party payment system. twazer is efficient: An item can be posted for sale on twazer using one screen in under 20 seconds. high_concept: Simple Powerful Small Cameras for the Future of Photography
name: Konost
product_desc:
Konost is the world's first full-frame all-digital rangefinder camera. Cameras for the future of photography. 

The Konost cameras are simple in functionality, free from unnecessary features cluttered in cameras today. They are also small and powerful, we have been able to design large sensors into small camera bodies. 

Konost stands out from all other cameras as true all-digital rangefinders. An innovative, modern take on a nostalgic style of taking photos. It's like driving a manual car; except the gearbox is made from alien technology and there's a 800hp engine under the hood.

The digital camera market has reached a critical inflection point due to the rise in mobile devices. Consumers that now buy cameras care about the photographic performance and experience, not unnecessary mobile-like-features which already exist on their phones. High-performance cameras are typically too large, bulky, and complex. Hence, Konost.

Yes, there will be a carbon-fiber version.

high_concept: Israel Founders power Start Up Nation producing world class technology
name: Israeli Founders by Flight.vc
product_desc:
Israel, aka StartUp Nation, is home to the most start ups, and the most exits, per capita of any country in the world.  Israel has 70 companies listed on the Nasdaq, making it third behind only the U.S. and China in terms of NASDAQ listings. Not bad for a population of 8.2 million. This dynamic tech ecosystem is the result of a well educated population which learns leadership skills at an early age as a result of their time in the military.  Israel also has enjoys accommodating government policies.  Finally, Israel itself is a startup (becoming an independent nation in 1948) and it's technology prowess is, in part, the result of the need of a nation to leverage technology to survive in a hostile environment (see IronDome).  

The Israel Syndicate invests in companies started by Israelis based in Israel, the U.S., or anywhere else.  The Syndicate is focused on, but not limited to, companies in cyber security, mobile, SaaS, iOT, digital media, AdTech, FinTech, including  B2B and B2C.

name: Education Data Solutions
product_desc:
Linking student achievement to teacher instruction is a complex and often trying task. Doing so with reliable methods in a time where most states (43) require evaluations of educators to be tied to such data is critical. 

Developing a model for using student data that is reliable and valid is imperative for achieving this task. At Education Data Solutions we have crafted a system that prepares data for human analysis in a way that most districts cannot conjure up themselves. EDS computes student growth multiple ways allowing districts to choose the method of analysis that best meets the purpose of the assessment. In addition, EDS organizes the mass of data that districts house in a manner that allows individual users from the superintendent of schools to a classroom teacher to see the impact their instruction has on student growth.

name: Q-Cigarettes
product_desc:
Developing new, evidence-based devices and products to help cigarettes smokers lead healthier lives.

Counseling and nicotine replacement for smoking cessation are brought together on mobile for the first time with the Q-Cigarettes App. Smokers are provided with the tools they need to build a caring, mobile support group of friends and family, as well as the medication they need to satisfy acute cravings.

We aim to develop the next generation of enzyme-based treatments for various diseases. Our innovations include improving both the upstream molecules and the downstream manufacturing process. On the downstream side, we are developing a novel chromatography purification device that is capable of purifying commercial quantities of biological drugs in an easy-to-use and cost-effective way. This "plug-and-play" concept device also utilizes a unique simulation software which takes advantage of computational power in order to make process development much simpler and more effective than the traditional approach.

Innovations at upstream and downstream areas will make medical treatments more effective and accessible.  Our vision is to decrease the "burden of treatment" on patients - financially, physically, and mentally. This is especially critical for enzyme-based therapies because patients would normally need to follow such treatments for a lifetime.

UroTech Surgical has developed an innovative minimally invasive medical device to treat the 100's of millions of men suffering from BPH globally.

BPH is the non cancerous enlargement of the prostate tissue.  As men age the prostate grows and it begins to create an obstruction that hinders the outflow of urine.  

The symptoms are the urge to frequently urinate, the inability to completely empty your bladder, weak urine flow, and excessive pressure to start a urine stream.

Truly one of the hottest markets in the med / tech sector!  

As men age 50+ they become 50% likely to be affected by BPH
As men age 60+ they become 60% likely to be affected by BPH
"      "     "    70+  "         "       70%    "       "          "              "

Our device has several patents with more pending!

We remove the bulk prostatic tissue that creates the obstructive symptoms.  Our device is Micro and is only the size of a toothpick!

With each interaction, Revel will collect and synthesize data to assist the fashion industry with inventory planning, placement, and risk mitigation.

Additionally, predictive, timely data is not available to the fashion industry, and inventory inefficiencies can lead to financial decline or ruin. As our model matures, Revel will have bespoke data available to address this problem.

name: Guru
product_desc:
Guru extends the app marketplace concept into the realm of personal tour guides.  The app matches an interested tourist with an available guide.  This allows for highly personalized and niche tour experiences that a mass tour company can't offer.  With Guru you can get the perfect guide no matter what language you speak or what your interests are. Millennials love experiences and Guru is all about creating them, pairing travelers (whether foreign tourists or locals exploring their own city) with real local guides who are passionate to share their city and their expertise.

The interface is similar to Airbnb (including ratings, reviews, self-set prices), but rather than a room/house being rented, the customer is renting the time of the guru.  Each guru creates a profile describing their background and the various tours or experiences they offer.
There are subtypes like Food Gurus, Nightlife Gurus, Nature Gurus or History Gurus, and guides in various languages (Chinese, Korean, etc).

BrushPass is the real dating deal - our product IS the date, it's not the possibility of a date. REAL DATES with compatible matches.

You want to find that compatible someone? We’ll get you in front of them. Lots of dating sites talk about dating but don't do anything to get you a date. Browsing through profiles or IMing with @Mr/MsRight246 is a time suck that usually leads to a dead end. Now you’re tired of talking about dating. Of swiping, winking, ghosting, and bageling. 

BrushPass is a mobile dating app that uses a compatibility algorithm and user’s proximity to find a match and set up a quick in-person interaction at a nearby cafe or bar. BrushPass’s value proposition lies in transforming and enhancing online dating by significantly reducing time when the match is found and when the two people meet live (2 hours) and increasing the likelihood of a live meeting by eliminating profiles and picture-driven biases and arranging a mutually convenient location walking distance away.

AreaOwl.com is a Yellow-Pages-like online advertising platform that allows hotel concierge and local merchants to provide mutual support.
AreaOwl creates custom concierge pages for each hotel that lists local restaurants and merchants. By clicking on any of the merchant buttons on the hotel concierge page, hotel staff or guests have easy access to rich merchant information (photos, map, etc.) and interactive functions (reservation, etc.) all in one place.
The service is free for hotels. We even offer a free tablet for the concierge/front desk to use.
Local merchants can be listed on this hotel-specific online concierge page at hotels of their choice for a monthly subscription. By being “short-listed” on the hotel’s concierge page, merchants greatly increase the chances of capturing business when travelers eat and/or buy locally.
Merchants are also encouraged to offer special deals to attract guests. Such pre-negotiated deals with local merchants can also help hotels sell more rooms.

Accessing and sharing sports highlights is clunky and fragmented.  Locating specific clips on Vine, YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, or league websites is cumbersome.  Reely changes all that by sending the best plays from your favorite sports, teams, and players directly to your mobile device as they happen.  More than a content aggregator, it’s a constantly updating personalized highlight reel.

Reely is a simple mobile application that allows fans to swipe through the best plays from all the games they care about.  With its video-centric design and clean layout, Reely makes it easier than ever to browse and share both current and classic highlights.  Reely will even send your favorite highlights directly to your phone minutes after they happen with a simple notification.  One click and you’re watching video.  Reely is different than other mobile video apps in that it is built for sports, connecting fans to the biggest plays in the best way yet.

high_concept: The best connectivity for your device wherever it may be
name: Wivity
product_desc:
The Telsa Model S has a slower wireless connection than a Chevy Cruze because when Telsa designed the Model S LTE didn’t exist.  Telsa now charges customers $500+ to upgrade to LTE. 

Wivity offers a Hardware/SaaS edge computing solution that eliminates the complexity of wireless connectivity- “Build Once, Connect Everywhere”.  Using our solution, a device designer connects to a hardware wireless modem like a web server- using HTTP calls.  The same HTTP calls are made no matter what the network (LTE, 3G, WiFi, SigFox, and even 5G when it is available).  Modems can be swapped out at any time to connect to a different network.  In this way, devices can have the optimal connectivity wherever they are, at any point in the product lifecycle.  Getting back to the Tesla example, if Tesla used Wivity the upgrade cost would be <$100. 

With Wivity, building connectivity into an IoT device is just like connecting to a web server.  "Twilio for the Internet of Things."

name: TestSnap
product_desc:
TestSnap is an automated testing solution that can test any software with an interface on any platform (without coding).  TestSnap operates by blending image recognition, optical character recognition, and bots to test software through the user interface…much the same way as software is tested manually today.

Our goal with TestSnap is to make automated testing easy and inexpensive enough to lower the barriers to adoption for any team, regardless of skill and financial circumstances.

Four important design considerations will set TestSnap apart from competitors:  

1)	Efficient: No code integration with the application or website that is being tested.  
2)	Inexpensive: Tests can be created in minutes rather than hours and NO engineering resources (or scripting) are necessary regardless of the complexity of the tests. 
3)	Scalable: TestSnap is platform agnostic and not tied to a specific browser.
4)	Ease of Use:  Can be used with little or no training.

high_concept: Clinical-grade, consumer-focused cardiac monitoring for at-risk population
name: NimbleHeart
product_desc:
80M+ people in the US are at risk of cardiovascular events. To adequately care for these people, medical practitioners need, multichannel, clinical-quality Electrocardiogram (ECG) devices that provide both on-site and remote, real-time, software-assisted monitoring and alerts. NimbleHeart is a clinical-grade, mobile cardiac monitoring platform that satisfies all of these needs. It's innovative, patent-pending technology and features include:

* Reusable, dry ECG electrode-based harness/strap
* No preparation requiring skin shaving/abrasion
* 1-lead  and 3-lead wireless form factors with custom-built ECG acquisition electronics
* Real-time ECG data transmission to smartphone/cloud for remote analysis
* Heart rate, harness status, and programmable alerts
* 24-hour rechargeable battery unit
* 12-lead form factor compatible with existing third party ECG hardware
* Thin, lightweight (< 150gm) material that is easy to clean

high_concept: Accounting Marketplace and Processing Optimization Platform
name: Reconcile Technologies
product_desc:
Reconcile Technologies is a cloud-based accounting marketplace and processing optimization platform.  

Internet applications continue to disrupt industries and reinvent antiquated workflow. The accounting industry, long characterized as ‘backward looking’, is in the early stages of such an evolution, as it transitions to forward-looking advisory, rooted in real-time financial data. However, this is contingent on timely processing of a client’s raw data into financial data. Although domestic teams can perform this laborious task in existing software, the cost is significant and the technology is not specialized, both of which obstruct progress.  

Reconcile Technologies will enable the evolution through a SaaS platform that streamlines transaction processing and securely connects local accounting firms to overseas labor teams. Our belief is that the accounting company of the future will have a domestic staff that is customer facing, while everything else is done offshore.

myFit is the first integrated fitness network in Mexico solving the needs of fitness & health enthusiasts and those of boutique fitness studios, by uniquely matching them through the myFit Network. 

Uniquely addressing both end ­users and fitness studios with an integral solution that will connect and create value for both. For end ­users myFit will offer a monthly membership that will grant unlimited classes at a variety of fitness studios within the myFit network at a price of US$79 without membership or cancellation fees. Boutique studios will benefit by being part of a platform that will link them with potential users, will bring in additional revenue at no incremental costs (myFit will pay a fixed fee per visit to fill their idle capacity), and will have access to management tools to improve their business performance. The platform is made up of 3 solutions: mobile app, website, and a performance management system.

name: RentFax
product_desc: RentFax helps rental property investors, lenders, property managers, insurers, and agents make faster, more informed, and more profitable decisions.  The company developed the Rental Income Stability Composite (RISC™) index to assess and quantify the qualitative measure of location. Using hundreds of data points and sub-indicies, the RISC score is a number 1-100 that reflects the volatility of income from a rental location, much like a FICO predicts repayment history by a consumer. RISC is independent of the tenant and the owner; it reflects the economic, demographic, crime, schools, housing mix, and other location-specific attributes of the address. The company also uses these analytics to provide narrower rent range estimates and can generate a proforma estimate of income from just the address, beds, baths and square footage.

high_concept: High precision B2B leads using artificial intelligence
name: LeadCrunch
product_desc:
B2B leads are poor and expensive to qualify. Current sources lacks all modern advantages of cross-validating multiple data sources, advanced analytics, and machine learning.  LeadCrunch™ finds B2B leads that look like your best customers.  

LeadCrunch™ - smarter leads through artificial intelligence.  

LeadCrunch™ is the only self service precision leads; Requires a list of your 25 best customers, no CRM integration necessary, and can deliver you high precision leads in less than 5 minutes. We put them through our patent pending two-step process to match you to your ideal leads.  Step 1, called SurfaceMatch, matches your customers to “look-alike” businesses.  Step 2, called DeepMatch, vets these businesses and prioritizes them based on digital footprint similarity.  Our product is a self-service model for pre-funnel B2B leads serving the mid-market & SMB.

The result?  New leads that are "clones" of the companies you already love working with and a 2-6X improvement in lead quality.

high_concept: Empire Pictures is a media and entertainment company started in 2016
name: Empire Pictures
product_desc: The film business has an impressive history of stability. Even at the height of the last financial crisis, as stocks whipsawed, banks imploded, and real estate holdings cratered, demand for film remained stable. As is the case with any given year, many of the films released during those dark days would have lost money, but across a diversified portfolio there have historically been a sufficient number of moneymakers to ensure that the film business as a whole remains consistently in the black.Venture capitalists use terms such as ‘unicorns’ to describe startups that grow to millions of users, billions in sales and enormous valuations. Investors use such colorful metaphors doesn’t mean they believe their average startup will end up in such rarified company. Knowing that the most probable outcome is a succession of failures, Silicon Valley’s angels like to spread their stardust across huge portfolios of statistically gauged bets and mix that with inside referrals from trusted sources.

high_concept: We make your hotel reservation cheaper
name: DreamCheaper
product_desc:
We find a better deal for your existing hotel reservation & rebook for you!

Simply forward your booking confirmation to hotel@dreamcheaper.com. We then continuously scan for a better deal and rebook for you. In the end you stay in the same room you initially booked, but pay on average ~15% (75 USD) less.
We charge 20% of the savings as success fee: if we don't save anything, we don't get anything. DreamCheaper is the only(!) company in the market that has a genuine interest, proven by the numbers, in reducing your hotel bill. All other companies benefit from higher prices — not us!

On the other hand we help hotels increase revenue by ensuring that more customers book directly, thus helping to wean hotels off the large hotel booking aggregators which take huge commissions.

Here's a short video:
https://vimeo.com/103802261

name: Your Local Cousin
product_desc:
Your Local Cousin adds the most human element to travel planning – communicating with an actual person who understands the traveler’s interests during the planning stage of a trip.  

Travelers pay between a nominal fee to communicate with a vetted local via Skype, e-mail or text and locals get paid for their expertise.  Travelers with hectic work schedules can choose to e-mail back and forth but those looking to dig deeper, can schedule 30 minute calls with locals who offer many unique insights not easily available online. Travelers fill out a form listing their interests, who they are traveling with etc. and this information is conveyed to locals they are matched with. In the next version of our site (launching soon), travelers will be able to select locals they share common interests with and add services such as text a local while on the trip, customized itineraries and travel maps.

We have connected hundreds of travelers and have a team of 500+ locals in 230 cities worldwide.

Drastic reduction in turnaround time from sample to result in this integrated smart system combined with mobile portability revolutionize current laboratory process.  
Initial pipeline – infectious diseases screening – performs diagnostic screening results of emergent (avian, swine, human influenza A) influenza antibody/antigens compared to conventional ELISA kits of 2-24 hours, future pipelines include rapid diagnostic kits for livestock and veterinary health (surveillance/diagnosis), rapid response to emerging diseases outbreak,  private clinical test and emergency triage. highly specific with multiplex capabilities.

high_concept: Exponentially faster and more productive social/behavioral research
name: Hyperthesis
product_desc:
Our innovative product helps social/behavioral researchers complete some of their most time-intensive research tasks in a fraction of the time those tasks normally take (1-5 minutes vs. up to 20 hours). 

Just some brief points, prior to NDA:

We've validated demand for this product via a rigorous national study of researchers (random sample = 293 Ph.D & Post-Doc students @ top 50 US research universities). This study looked at reported task completion times, as well as reported effort levels. The National Centers for Research has corroborated the need, and a few renowned business school faculty have reviewed the concept with very high marks.

Our product is fully conceptualized, our R&D plan is solid, we know the target market in and out, and our market entry strategy is planned out. Now, we just need an investor or two! 

More info upon request + NDA. We're excited to hear from you!

high_concept: Teaching your smartphone how to read.
name: Anyline
product_desc:
Anyline is the first dynamic text recognition SDK (Software Development Kit), which enables developers to build their use cases without deep knowledge in computer vision algorithms. Via defining parameters like font, color, character set and size of the text, the developer can build a custom application featuring a passport scan function, a serial number import or a simple anagram builder for scrabble letters. 

The SDK can be downloaded for free and comes with existing implementation examples. The technology works independently of the mobile platform and is therefore able to be implemented in iOS, Android, Windows Phone and HTML5 applications. Furthermore, Anyline will pursue showcases on smartglasses in 2016.

Current customers include Red Bull Mobile, mySugr, Konica Minolta, Epson, Tascent, and many more.

name: Clarity Memorial
product_desc:
Clarity Memorial will solve two problems with the typical funeral home: (1) aggressive commissioned salespeople, and (2) old-fashioned mortuaries.

Traditional funeral homes are slow to adopt modern online offerings, and rely on traditional prospecting, door-to-door soliciting, and cold calling to market their services. The sales approach is often a high-pressure emotional game. Clarity Memorial will allow consumers to plan and purchase a funeral completely online, in the privacy of their own homes. Our site provides up-front pricing and simplified options.

Most funeral homes hold their services in dated mortuary buildings connected to their embalming and crematory facilities. Clarity Memorial will instead create Care Centers akin to contemporary retail storefronts. We’ll partner with existing mortuaries to rent usage of their facilities for preparing the remains when needed, and we’ll host the services in modern event spaces like halls, ballrooms, gardens, private homes, or churches.

name: Fingr.
product_desc:
Fingr gives users the power to shape smarter local buzz. With Fingr users tie conversations to real-world locations so getting in the know is faster and more fun!  

With Fingr, users tie conversations to a GPS coordinate. Conversations are then overlaid onto the real world, so it’s easy to see what’s being talked about where. Unlike other “hyperlocal” apps, Fingr enables users to talk about the smallest of small locations. Discussions are no longer limited to restaurants, businesses, or places with an address.

Fingr improves upon existing social media because it’s location-centric. Unlike traditional social media platforms that force users to “friend” or “follow” people, Fingr is a public discussion forum so who a user knows no longer has to limit how far their message can travel. And unlike proximity-based social media platforms that only let users talk to people nearby, Fingr lets users talk to anyone, anywhere so users control where the discussions take place.

product_desc:
Energize Kids LLC is a Portland, Oregon based company that develops fun apps & devices to benefit all youths & their families including those with special needs ("Extreme Users" in d.school verbiage -- Autism, ADHD, & Weight Management) by encouraging mindfulness, self care, mood management, pro-social skills & an active lifestyle to manage symptoms.

First product in development is a hyper connected but affordable & fun pill (medication & supplements) tracking system with multiple levels of notifications to youth and adult with increasingly frequency.  

As a busy parent of two special needs kids ( ADHD & Autism ) -- morning & night routines can be tough on everyone as we race to get ready and deal with distractions. 

Product will dispense 14 different doses either 2x day for 7 days or 14 days. This is not a simple pill bottle, app on a reminder phone app or plastic tray. This is an interactive device that can connect and communicate in multiple ways based on what works best for you.

name: Biogas & Electric
product_desc:
Biogas & Electric has developed an air pollution control technology called NOxRx (US Patent #8,012,746 B2 and other patents pending) which can be used in conjunction with all biogas engines in the market today. NOxRx is a wet scrubbing technology, has a low cost and is better at reducing pollutants such as NOx and SOx.

Customer Problem:
Currently available SOx and NOx reduction systems are not capable of complying with the California Air Resource Board’s (CARB) NOx standard of 0.07 lbs. of NOx per Megawatt Hour. NOxRx enables a biogas project to use a low cost internal combustion engine to produce energy and comply with the CARB air emissions standard. 

Product/Service:

Mobscenity is a hilarious new adult party game where players compete to turn innocent words into the most outrageous definitions imaginable. Mobscenity is incredibly easy to play: every round of Mobscenity, the round's "Master" picks 2 innocent words from their hand to create a Mobscenity Phrase. high_concept: On-demand power network. Portable chargers at your favorite locations.
name: doblet
product_desc:
Doblet is changing the way you use your smartphone.

Battery life is the single biggest problem we have with our smartphones. Surveys rate it as a bigger problem than the next three issues combined. It’s the one feature that matters most (more than web access) – yet 80% of us charge our phones every single day, and a third of us 2+ times a day.

Most of us don’t take our chargers everywhere we go – we find ourselves planning around charging, borrowing others’ chargers, and always running low. Even when we bring chargers, we’re constantly on the hunt for that elusive outlet.

Enter Doblet. We’ve built a network of super-portable chargers that fully charges your phone in under an hour, wherever you happen to be. Whether you’re at your favorite bar or restaurant, on vacation at the beach, taking part in a startup conference, or even doing jury duty, we’ve got you covered. Just ask your bartender or concierge for a Doblet, plug it into your phone, and get back to doing what you do best.

high_concept: Accelerating Personalized Medicine R&D via Social and Big Data; Biological/Clinical Data
name: Sanguine
product_desc:
Sanguine is a technology-enabled company innovating at the intersection of personalized medicine, biobanking, and biomedical research. It has a simple and attractive, proven business model. Sanguine collects blood samples and associated medical data from patients diagnosed with specific conditions. It processes those samples to extract biospecimen such as cells, serum, plasma and DNA, and stores them along with the medical data. It then sells the biospecimen and data to academic and pharmaceutical entities for research purposes.  

Problem & Solution:
Traditionally, research companies need to wait for physicians to set up appointments with patients and to find some willing to sign up. Patients go to Sanguine because Sanguine offers increased transparency in the research process, showing them where samples are used and how they advance biomedical research in areas they care about.

name: Melody App
product_desc:
Melody is a content aggregation, curation and social sharing platform. Think of it as Flipboard for Fans or a "Targeted Interest Feed"
 
Currently there is no current central hub for music fans. Instead, fans have to search across multiple sources (social networks, youtube, publications etc.) and too many types of content (pics, tweets, feeds, videos, flows, etc.). The result is that fans miss critical content, waste time searching and cannot effectively share or discover content.
 
Melody enables fans to follow, discover and share content by aggregating all social feeds, articles and videos in one place. It solves the issue of missed content while enabling the sharing of content to new and existing social graphs. To be clear, Melody is not a streaming service but a free, ubiquitous platform that is open to everyone.
 
We are creating affinity targeting at scale. We are starting with music but building the platform to extend to other verticals such as sports, celebrity, and film.

name: Jestr
product_desc:
Jestr is a social media app built by comedians. We are seeing the increasing compartmentalization of social media.  Delectable is like Instagram but just for wine. Heck, Instagram is like Facebook but just for photos. It's like the early days of television -- where once there were 4 channels that showed everything, now there are channels that cater to specific tastes and interests -- food, comedy, sports.  Jestr seeks to be social media for jokes.  It daily features a different standup comedian and allows users to find new comedians to follow, as well as discover top trending jokes. The customers are both comedians, who have a forum targeted to give them exposure, as well as fans of comedy, who now have a social media space free of clutter.

To date, we have 1300 downloads and over 100 user a day. Over 5,000 jokes have been posted on the app. We have loyal users but need guidance and to figure out how to reach a broader audience.

name: Valencia Technologies
product_desc:
Valencia's product, the Subcutaneous Neuromodulation System ("SNS"), is a pacemaker-like device that is radically small, low-cost to produce, and both simple and safe to implant.  

Placed just below the skin in the forearm for the treatment of hypertension, the device is implanted in a simple outpatient procedure taking about 20 minutes.  It is low cost to produce and radically small at 1/8th the volume of the smallest pacemaker-like device on the market.  

The early clinical results show that SNS works to reduce blood pressure in drug resistant hypertensive people-- those with the most poorly controlled blood pressure.  SNS also has applications for treatment of other major chronic conditions like depression, Parkinson's disease, and erectile dysfunction.

name: Tic Tac Go
product_desc:
Isn't it odd that most mobile games aren't actually mobile?  Experience the newest (and only) location-based social media game...that literally turns your world into a game board!

Challenge a friend to Tic-Tac-Go and the app will create a tic-tac-toe game board tailored to both you and your opponent's locations.  Each square represents a type of location (a coffee shop, a park, etc.) that is close to you and your opponent, regardless of whether you are in the same city or even in the same country.

To mark a square on the game board, all you need to do is check-in at a location that matches the square category...then snap a photo to prove you are there!  The first player to mark 3 squares in a row wins!

Tic-Tac-Go includes:

- Top Photo page for the most popular pics

- Updated Feed to keep track of your social network's activity

- Smack Talk between opponents

- Badges to commemorate your achievements

- The Leaderboard showing who has bragging rights

- Instant sharing

name: HitFin
product_desc:
HitFin (formerly spritzle.io) is building a derivatives trading and settlement platform with cutting edge technology. Our platform allows anyone to instantly settle their trades without the need for an intermediary and with limited counter-party risk.

Our platform is based on Ethereum, a powerful new smart contracts technology inspired by Bitcoin. Our platform allows end users to enter into and settle complex financial contracts without the need for an intermediary. Transactions are executed by a distributed network of nodes and cryptographically secured through the blockchain. Once a trade is entered into, collateral is locked in the blockchain and the trade will execute automatically.

Our team has backgrounds in software engineering, finance, and law. Our mission is to build a trusted, vertically integrated platform to trade financial instruments online.

name: Tee Project
product_desc:
The golf tee never gets much love, but is a necessity to play the game. Through a monthly subscription offering, we bring the golf tee right to the golfer's door, offering convenience and affordability. Packs are designed to include a tee for every club in the bag.

There's no question of value. We make it quick and easy to order. Our golfers can update, skip a delivery, or cancel at their leisure. 

Our golf tees are made from recycled industrial scraps in The USA. They're tough, built to last substantially longer than wooden tees and other cheap plastic tees on the market. Golfers will use fewer, buy less, and approach the tee box in style. 
 
The reduced resistance technology provides our golfers with less contact with the tee. This results in reduced ball spin, a higher and faster launch off the tee box, and increase roll. While we never claim to shave strokes off of your score card, we'll promise to deliver a product that won't let you down.

Karma Points is reinventing the way Millennials interact with charity, changing the occasions to donate and creating a piggybank for the world. 

Users auto donate $1/day and those funds are applied to a new charity each week, based on their personality. (we take an 8% fee)

Our target users (Slactavist Millennials) have vocalized a want to reach multiple causes in a convenient, simple, trustworthy and IMPACTFUL way, while not breaking the bank. 

We're also reinventing the way charities report back to donors with our "progress updates" feature, adding a new level of transparency. 

Our "surprise rewards club" rewards top sharing users (who bring 2 or more friends to Karma Points) with free one:for:one items, discounts, and assorted goods -- creating a targeted funnel for burgeoning one:for:one companies to directly reach their audience.
 
Finally, together, give to 52 causes each year, take charitable giving out of isolation, and give for goodness sake.

Students like this are in college for a longer period of time, graduate without a purpose and drop out of college. We provide resources for students to avoid this.

We do this by providing self-assessment questionnaires designed to encourage self-reflection and access to information on careers that are aligned with their skillset and interest. product_desc:
Without bars or chains a young woman is trapped within an apartment where cameras broadcast her every move through the internet. As shady characters come out of the shadows with hidden motives, she must fight her way through the web of deceit before it's too late.

Apartment 13 was conceived after viewing a liquor store security camera system as multiple angles of the store are shown on one screen. As different groups of people wandered the liquor store, a story unraveled before my eyes. Watching the patrons pick out their favorite drinks or snacks was very interesting to watch. So why not make a movie out of it?

With all the elements in place Apartment 13 will boil down to a life and death struggle with a beautiful young woman ensnared within its walls. Every corner could be a trap, every camera could be weapon, and anyone could be the enemy.

An authoring/publishing platform for interactive drama (Mpaths).

Our interactive drama or Mpath, Masq, was selected as one of the Top 100 Games of all Time by PC Gamer. It was the only interactive drama on the list. Masq was never promoted or sold. Launched for the mobile market, it would have the potential for multi-million dollar sales. 

The funds will allow us to improve our platform to empower hundreds of storytellers, media companies and brands to create Mpaths. New IP and popular IP that don’t translate into games will finally become interactive and profitable IP as soap operas, sitcoms, drama, and romance— There is a $100B story-based industry with no way of translating storytelling into interactive. 

Mpaths are single-player experiences in which the player is the active protagonist, not of a game but of a story. Players' choices trigger an unprecedented number of plot twists and outcomes, encouraging players to replay and share their discoveries.

CollideScope is a free mobile app that allows users to Collide (send friend/follow requests on multiple social networks) and Scope (view those friend’s latest posts on one simple, swipe-through news feed).

Forget remembering different usernames/handles and jumping between countless apps to get scattered information throughout the day. CollideScope solves these problems by linking all social media profiles into ONE app; connecting users with multiple friends, artists and brands in ONE step; and presenting ONE swipe-through news feed to view latest posts regardless of where they're made. 

The app not only minimizes user effort and improves their online experience, but it's valuable for marketers who can use it to connect the dots between a consumer's diverse profiles to gain insight on their audience's true interests/behaviors. The data aggregated from apps develops a 360 consumer profile based on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, Vine, SoundCloud, Pinterest and Venmo.

high_concept: Next-Generation of Data Visualization for Doctors
name: Patient Insight
product_desc:
Electronic health records are everywhere but difficult to use. 

With increasing patient complexity + rapidly evolving technology, there is more data than ever before for physicians to make decisions.

The problem is that EHR platforms don't make it easy to find the necessary information when providers need it at the point-of-care.

What providers need is a way to rapidly have an accurate history of prior care, including diagnosis, procedures, medications, care plans and physician notes in a way that is easy searchable, intelligently displayed and intuitive to use.

With alternative payment models that reward cost-conscious, efficient care, well organized patient information is an essential ingredient to providing high-value care.

We integrate disparate electronic medical records and provide advanced search, analytics and data visualization tools to make complex medical data useful to physicians and to finally give each each specialist prior history that meets their needs.

name: Describe App
product_desc:
Describe is a free mobile app that allows people to find out what their social circle likes the most about them. It's a simple, streamlined way to tell your friends why they’re awesome.

In order to ensure that Describe is an environment free of insults, Describers draw upon a curated list of words and phrases to describe their friends. Describers can suggest words and phrases to be added in the future, all of which go through a through human moderation process.

Alex Chiou, co-founder, explained the beginnings of Describe, “I had a friend in high school who was a truly awesome guy -- diplomatic, helpful, kind -- but had self-esteem issues. I had him in mind when I was brainstorming the foundation for this project. We wanted to create a platform where it’s easy to bring out the best in people.”

You can describe your friends privately or publicly, and you can use your name or be anonymous. Describing someone who doesn’t have the app triggers a text invitation for them to join.

name: CodersTrust
product_desc:
Almost half the world — over three billion people — live on less than $2.50 a day. This limits them from getting an education and pursuing a better life.

CodersTrust provides microfinance for students in emerging markets to upgrade their IT skills, so they can earn more money on online marketplaces such as Elance and oDesk.

Online marketplaces are transforming the world of work as millions of jobs are made available online. There are jobs for over $2 billion within IT & Programming on Elance alone.

THIS IS HOW IT WORKS
- Students are carefully chosen to avoid bad loans.
- The student receive a monthly loan backed by sponsors.
- The student undergoes a series of tests to determine their skill level.
- They are attached a mentor and proposed courses to follow.
- The students improve their skills.
- While studying they start to put their new-learned skills to use in freelance jobs that CodersTrust helps them find.

Yedy is a next-generation, multi-channel, digital television platform specifically for Rising Millennials. It will curate and distribute popular and new content of a variety of genres to all connected devices, while setting new standards for participatory viewing, advertising engagement, and social impact. 

While Millennials watch, on average, about 4 hours of traditional content and less than an hour of online video daily, they're largely unsatisfied with their experience with cable and broadcast TV. Since the invention of TV, technology has forced broadcasters and MSOs to target broad audiences simultaneously, introducing significant content risk, impeding advertisers, and leaving viewers underwhelmed. Meanwhile online video is increasingly fragmented.

Internet delivery of TV content is the future of television as it enables single-audience platforms to significantly reduce content risk, provide targeted advertising opportunities, and dramatically enhance the viewing experience.

The App has a freemium model although during beta launching all filters are free.

Proven is annualizing $1.4m in revenues and $570k in gross margins. Proven has grown 350% so far in 2015, and projects it will reach profitability in Q116.

With Proven, customers can distribute their jobs to 16 job boards, as well as their social networks and their own website. Customers can then organize applicants and hire using our mobile and desktop products. 

Proven customers get 3x as many applicants and can go through the applications 10x as fast as traditional sources. Proven makes money on subscriptions (recurring) as well as on fees added to job postings (discretionary, but predictable).
 
This is a large underserved market. Proven targets the needs of small business operators with a mobile-heavy approach (40% of our employee logins are from a mobile device). We have strong and improving unit economics, and a repeatable distribution engine.

Everpix has been focusing the past 18 months on the next big opportunity in the consumer photo space: solving the Photo Mess.

We are entering a future where every single moment of our lives will be captured in photos. A tsunami of photos is overwhelming consumers across demographics: 68% of Americans want to browse their photo collection more often while 62% of people cited organization and finding the right photo as the biggest frustration.

Everpix is the consumer photo platform to effortlessly get people’s life photo collection into shape and automatically surface what inspires them.

We can demonstrate our photo platform is at least 1 year ahead of everyone else in science / tech / UX, has high user engagement (42% weekly / 53% monthly just for free users), double-digits subscription rates across the board (e.g. 20%+ for people syncing 1,000+ photos), a revenue model that works (we are cash flow positive on our variable costs), phenomenal user reviews and press coverage.

high_concept: Social Productivity to get things done, together
name: Pingpad
product_desc:
Pingpad is the social productivity app to get things done, together. The first app to combine collaborative notes, messaging and task management in one. For families, friends, communities, classmates and teams. Works across iPhone, iPad, Android phone and tablet, and web desktop. 

Pingpad is a "Whatsapp for Productivity," with a consumer freemium business model. The mobile shift has already moved email to messaging. It will move Docs to collaborative notes. Pingpad is the first app natively designed for this Social Productivity opportunity, filling the gap between personal productivity and document-centric enterprise collaboration. Make School is building a university replacement for computer science.

Students network with successful founders and developers throughout the program, and are placed at a tech startup upon graduating. The program has no up front cost, students pay tuition through internship and post-grad job earnings.

We also power cashless and mobile payments for vending machines, mobile apps for vending delivery drivers and technicians, web apps for efficiently scheduling thousands of vending machines, and other technology that helps vending operators take control of their business, optimize routes, and go mobile.

Our software already manages over 100,000 vending machines. But there are 5M+ vending machines in the US alone, so we have lots of room to grow.

name: PRENAV
product_desc: PRENAV is developing an automated system to capture data about the world’s infrastructure using small aerial robots. Navigating along pre-defined, repeatable flight paths, PRENAV’s drones take photographs from precise locations in close proximity to structures to build accurate 3D reconstructions of industrial assets. The system consists of a commercial drone, a guidance robot on the ground, and software to plan the mission and analyze the data. Users have 24 hours to decide whether or not they like the person they are matched with. If both matches like each other, they get connected and are able to chat directly through the app without needing to reveal any personal contact information.

- Users meet friends of friends or people with similar socio-economic status, education or interests through the Facebook Graph API

- No profile browsing, anonymity until there is a mutual like, and in-app chat protect user privacy fitting Asian culture

- While there are over 5,000 dating companies fighting over 300M people in the US, there are only a handful companies in SEA targeting a market of 600M people within the region. Noonswoon is already emerging as the dominant player.

high_concept: Deployment Automation & Governance Platform for Container-based Applications
name: DCHQ
product_desc:
DCHQ delivers enterprise discipline to Linux Containers application lifecycle management. Available in hosted and on-prem versions, DCHQ gives infrastructure operators the controls and end-to-end automation they need while still giving app developers the agility they want when moving from dev/test to production model.

DCHQ ships with enhancements to Docker Compose like cross-image environment variable bindings, extensible BASH script plug-ins that can be invoked at request time or post-provision, application clustering for high availability across multiple hosts and auto scaling.

It automates the provisioning and auto-scaling of virtual infrastructure on 12 different cloud providers - including OpenStack, CloudStack, DigitalOcean, Google Compute Engine, SoftLayer, AWS, Rackspace, etc. 

Lastly, it eliminates "Shadow IT" by enabling granular access controls to clusters, application templates, builds, plug-ins and Docker repositories (like Docker Hub and Red Hat Registry).

name: Medlio
product_desc:
In 2000, patients were responsible for 5% of the total medical bill (mostly in the form of defined and easy to collect copays). Today, they are now responsible for 30% (mostly in the form of difficult to determine high deductibles and co-insurances).

Unfortunately, provider organizations are ill equipped to deal with this fundamental shift in payment flow. As a result, they are experiencing an unprecedented growth in patient bad debt, now a $100B problem. Medlio is solving this problem by pushing patient collections to the front of the revenue cycle.

Medlio’s web-based application for providers accurately estimates the cost of patient encounters before they occur, so patient-responsible balances can be collected on the front-end of a visit, prior to service. Medlio's patent-pending solution is perfectly scalable and requires near-zero implementation effort.

name: Amplify Health
product_desc:
Amplify Health is helping primary care physicians (PCP) reassert their role as the principal navigator of their patients' healthcare journeys. Our software enables PCPs to direct contract with self insured employers (SIEs) and proactively manage their patients. When doctors are being paid for outcomes, they have one mandate: create effective treatment plans that their patients follow. 

We created the software to measure and achieve this mandate. We combine medical record data (the plan of what should happen) with claims and other sources (what's actually happening) and surface two major deviations that are indicative of future avoidable healthcare costs.

Off the Plan: not adhering to prescribed treatment plan e.g. did not take $50 medication
Off the Ranch(OTR): utilizing healthcare without the PCPs knowledge e.g. $50,000 self referral to spine surgeon
The examples in the 3rd slide are outputs from our rules engine that identified OTR activity

name: SunFunder
product_desc:
SunFunder is a solar finance business based in San Francisco and Tanzania with a mission to unlock capital for solar energy in emerging markets, where over 2.5 billion people live without access to reliable energy. We aggregate capital through the Solar Empowerment Fund, a private debt offering that gives Accredited Investors an opportunity to invest in a diversified, vetted and high-impact portfolio of off-grid and grid deficit solar projects. With this capital, we provide short-term inventory and project finance loans to leading solar energy companies to help them scale deployments of solar energy systems and catalyze growth in the sector.

SunFunder has financed $2 million of solar projects, with 16 solar companies in 6 countries, and maintains a zero percent default rate. This has helped over 250,000 people get access to affordable solar energy. In the next five years SunFunder aims to raise and deploy $1 billion into solar projects around the world.

high_concept: A digital publication dedicated to covering the European technology industry in depth
name: Tech.eu
product_desc:
Tech.eu is a new digital publication dedicated to covering the European tech industry in depth, through data-based analysis, research, insights, opinion, investigative journalism and the delivery of relevant news with context.

We believe there are certain regions in Europe, primarily the (but not only) emerging markets in central and Eastern Europe, that are currently being underreported on.

Too many great stories are being left untold, and we think the broader, global tech community would benefit if that weren’t the case.

Simply put, we’re not satisfied with the coverage of the European tech industry as it stands today, and to scratch our own itch we aim to produce the type of quality content we would like to read ourselves.

Salespeople and Recruiters are highly dependent on their professional networks to be successful. Salespeople typically have large territories with hundred of individuals they are trying to sell to. If those people aren’t in their network already, they often resort to cold calling and cold emailing. However, networks are not static. They are expanding everyday. There is no way to know when new relevant connections occur.

OFunnel provides real-time monitoring of your networks so you don’t miss out on valuable connections as they happen.
