high_concept: We help investors minimize capital gain taxes
name: CapGain Solutions
product_desc:
Conceived by serial entrepreneur and angel investor Gary Kremen, CapGain Solutions helps venture capitalists, private equity general partners and angel investors divest private assets to realize taxable losses that offset other taxable gains. 

CapGain Solutions purchases private assets such as common stock, preferred stock, private notes and the like enabling investors to divest stranded "zombie" assets and realize tax losses that shield capital gains (and in some cases ordinary income for Section 1244 stock). We offer turn-key services that provide the definitive, defensible documentation, process and procedures necessary to realize and recognize your capital losses in the current year. 

Selling to CapGain Solutions can be especially helpful if the company you want to write off has not been closed with formal legal documentation or it is still operating but "walking dead," and the tax write off is worth more to you than owning the stock.

Visit us at http://www.CapGainSolutions.com.

name: Connora Technologies
product_desc:
Product:
Our initial products, called Recyclamines, are cleavable epoxy curing agents (polyamines) for use in high growth, performance composites applications, where RECYLABILITY is a necessary driver to meet: 
• COST REDUCTION 
• REGULATORY COMPLIANCE 
• ENVIRONMENTAL FOOTPRINT

Problem:
High volume composite (epoxy + carbon fiber) manufacturers in the automotive and aerospace industry are currently facing cost and regulatory compliance issues. OEMs need to reclaim and reuse waste composite from manufacturing to lower COGS and meet government directives on recyclable content of vehicles. Connora enables the most efficient method for recycling and reclaiming high value composite materials with no sacrifice to material performance.

Target Market:
High volume composite manufacturing (epoxy + carbon fiber) in the Automotive and Aerospace Industries. As the use of composites in these industries are quickly growing, they are actively seeking more efficient recycling technologies.

high_concept: Wearable devices for peace of mind.
name: Simple Wearables
product_desc:
The project is a wearable device that aims to provide peace of mind for the ageing population and their loved ones. It will be worn on the wrist, neck or waist and detect the elderly when they fall down and then send an alert to the authorities, family members and caregivers. In the background, it will be measuring steps taken every day. The wearable device can synchronize to a mobile application to download daily steps / active minute data and upload the data to a cloud for remote data retrieval anywhere around the world.

All the current medical alert systems are sold in the US and all look like plastic appliances that stigmatize the elderly wearing it. high_concept: We make games that make you smarter.

product_desc:
Think of any leading mainstream video game – mobile or console. Now imagine if you could take everything that makes that game cool and use that to teach math. That’s what we’re doing at 7 Generation Games. 

With games incorporating adventure gaming, math and Native American culture, we’re creating cutting-edge games that people want to play and where they learn math along the way. We bring together top-of-the-line graphics, advanced game design, educational research and data analysis to create games that engage and educate. Our games are targeted at players grades 4-8 (but have from gifted 1st graders to remedial high schoolers). We’re changing the way you look at learning games. 

Our first two games, Spirit Lake and Fish Lake, are commercially available for Mac and PC. Our cross-platform game (computer and mobile), Forgotten Trail, is in development with release slated for Fall 2015. Our first bilingual game (Spanish/English), AzTech, has received funding and is in preproduction.

name: FindMe
product_desc:
FindMe is an Alzheimer’s wearable that keeps people safe when they go outside.

The Big Idea behind FindMe is to create dementia-safe neighborhoods to save 64MM families tremendous wear and tear. (Nextdoor.com for Alzheimer’s care).

FindMe’s about the latest thinking in dementia care: spurred on by the UKs NHS and their budgets being crushed by warehousing dementia patients: create dementia-safe communities to allow people to remain in their own neighborhoods, safely.

FindMe is not a GPS locator like Tile.

FindMe guards against freezing, falling, drowning, traffic, getting lost—the common dangers for Alzheimer’s.  

The Alzheimer’s Association has already sought us out for their Live Alone pilot projects in San Mateo and San Francisco Counties.

Our team’s made up of PhD's, Stanford, MIT, RISD, and Carnegie Mellon alums. Our founders have successful startups CyFluent (exit-Kaiser), ShopBee, and Tiny News.

name: Sport Mantel
product_desc:
Our product is to make all videos over 20 minutes watchable in less than 5 minutes. 

Sport Mantel is a crowd-sourced video logging system. We built an intuitive, simple annotation tool that allows verified users to note important moments as they watch a video. It's as easy as writing a text message. 

Viewers can jump ahead in the video to highlighted moments using animated cue points in the timeline or watch the full video with insights synced to the event. It's like watching a program on your DVR and fast-forwarding through the boring content but hitting play to watch the best parts. 

We are using this data set of "important moments" to build a machine-learning, automated system that can pick out key moments in all similar long videos. 

The customers are people who watch videos online and want to save time and content producers. Sport Mantel let's you search and skip ahead to just to moments you care about. Our goal is to catalogue and understand just what is important in videos.

high_concept: 1st Ever Consumer Wearable Sensor to Measure Metabolism
name: Glucovation
product_desc:
Glucovation's SugarSenz™ is the first body-worn sensor that measures blood sugar levels continuously and accurately in real time. This data is distilled into a few consumer-friendly metrics and broadcast to your smartwatch, smartphone or activity tracker, giving unprecedented insight into your individual metabolism. This information is especially useful for the obese and pre-diabetic, but also for individuals dedicated to health and fitness, particularly endurance athletes. 

As body worn sensors become more technologically advanced, they are also becoming increasingly popular and losing the niche status they once had. Devices currently on the market far outstrip the classic pedometer, monitoring not just your step count, but the speed and intensity of your activity, your heart rate, and even how many reps you've done of what kind of activity. But we're still missing an essential piece of the puzzle: metabolic monitoring.

name: Contender.com
product_desc:
When tickets sell out, or the seats you’re looking for aren’t available, the resale market can be downright intimidating, making it impossible to know if you’re getting a fair deal. Without a Kelly Blue Book for tickets, 12B dollars of tickets unsold, or priced incorrectly each year.

Contender is a community-driven, event ticket marketplace that encourages buyers & sellers to agree on deals reflecting what a ticket’s really worth. The offer-based technology makes virtually every ticket on the secondary market negotiable, eliminating middleman, service fees, and speculative pricing. Users can expect to save roughly 25% to 45% from competitors such as Stubhub, Seatgeek, & Ticketmaster TM+. The site is live, generating revenue, and has acquired over $500MM of seller tickets, equaling 75% of StubHub’s total inventory. The company is raising a $750k convertible debt seed round, concentrating on building out the industry’s first mobile negotiation platform and consumer awareness.

name: Zepteon
product_desc:
Zepteon has developed a breakthrough antibody development and manufacturing technology that enables biopharmaceutical companies to evaluate and tune their drug potency. This is accomplished by separating high potency antibodies (nonfucosylated) from complex mixtures using our Glycap-3A chromatography resin. This technology streamlines the regulatory required structure:function characterization activities and enables a new method of drug manufacturing for biosimilars, biobetters and novel therapeutics. 

In 2012 the global monoclonal antibody market exceeded $40 billion in sales and the antibody biosimilars market is projected to exceed $25 billion. In addition, there are at least ten currently licensed human plasma derived antibody therapeutics that together comprise more than $6 billion in annual US revenue.  In exchange for fees, milestones and royalties on drug sales, our technology can enable more efficient development and manufacturing of drugs in these markets.

Smart Locus software automatically manages and controls BMS systems in real time. The solution reduces office building HVAC energy by 70%-80% while improving occupants comfort.  In addition, based on our predictive machine learning technology the software protects BMS  component failure and mismanagement risk. 
No upfront investment, neither hardware (not even sub-meters) nor software, or additional resources commitment required. We complement existing building BAS. We will NOT interfere with central plant operations.

The entire building control shall be carefully and gradually staged according to building manager’s plans.

Spoiler Shield is currently available on iOS, Android and Kindle. We are also exploring white label solutions leveraging our proprietary technology, which has a provisional patent.  

We launched at the end of last year and have since been featured in CNN, NY Times, LA Times, Yahoo News, USA Today and Bloomberg. Our mission is to protect you from spoilers of your favorite shows and sporting events.

name: Preccelerator® Program
product_desc: Stubbs Alderton & Markiles' Preccelerator™ Program is a platform offered to select start-up companies out of our Santa Monica office that provides interim office space and sophisticated fixed-fee legal services, with the objective of helping you grow your idea from business concept to funded startup.  The Preccelerator™ Program provides free co-working space, mentorship, educational programs, and other strategic perks for 5-10 promising young startups.

name: The Video Technology Company
product_desc:
According to Business Insider Intelligence (BII), the market for consumer and business robots will reach $1.5B by 2019, bigger than the worldwide industrial robot market. To dominate this market, we start with a friendly acquisition followed by rebooting with a new business strategy we call Robots-as-a-Service (RaaS). There are significant patents issued. Our CTO was the target's head of engineering until YE2013. His modular next generation version supports the RaaS model. 

Telepresence robots allow a person to feel as if they are present in a remote location with the people at that location feeling he is actually there! It enables face-to-face communications, bridging the physical divide whether you are down the hall, or around the world. This is a vital tool for large enterprises as well as anyone separated by distance. 

RaaS extends cloud-based services via robotic mobility without needing to build and manage connected robots. New businesses will evolve from this platform.
